SourceAnalyzer.Name: StyleCop+
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Plug-in that extends original StyleCop features. Some settings for this plug-in are taken out to the separate StyleCop+ settings page.

StringProperty.Name: AdvancedNaming_PublicInstanceField
StringProperty.Description: Naming rules for public instance field.

StringProperty.Name: AdvancedNaming_ProtectedInstanceField
StringProperty.Description: Naming rules for protected instance field.

StringProperty.Name: AdvancedNaming_PrivateInstanceField
StringProperty.Description: Naming rules for private instance field.

StringProperty.Name: AdvancedNaming_InternalInstanceField
StringProperty.Description: Naming rules for internal instance field.

StringProperty.Name: AdvancedNaming_PublicStaticField
StringProperty.Description: Naming rules for public static field.

StringProperty.Name: AdvancedNaming_ProtectedStaticField
StringProperty.Description: Naming rules for protected static field.

StringProperty.Name: AdvancedNaming_PrivateStaticField
StringProperty.Description: Naming rules for private static field.

StringProperty.Name: AdvancedNaming_InternalStaticField
StringProperty.Description: Naming rules for internal static field.

StringProperty.Name: AdvancedNaming_MethodPrivateEventHandler
StringProperty.Description: Naming rules for private event handler.

BooleanProperty.Name: SP1502_AllowConstructors
BooleanProperty.Description: Allows constructors to be placed on a single line (for SP1502 rule).

BooleanProperty.Name: SP1509_AllowNestedCodeBlocks
BooleanProperty.Description: Allows using nested code blocks (for SP1509 rule).

Rule.Name: AdvancedNamingRules
Rule.Context: {0} name {1} doesn't conform the specified style: {2}.
Rule.Description: Provides wide and flexible variety of naming rules. See StyleCop+ settings page for details.

Rule.Name: ElementMustNotBeOnSingleLine
Rule.Context: The {0} must not be placed on a single line. The opening and closing curly brackets must each be placed on their own line.
Rule.Description: Extends original SA1502 rule (disable SA1502 when using this rule). See more options clicking StyleCop+ node in the tree.

Rule.Name: OpeningCurlyBracketsMustNotBePrecededByBlankLine
Rule.Context: An opening curly bracket must not be preceded by a blank line.
Rule.Description: Extends original SA1509 rule (disable SA1509 when using this rule). See more options clicking StyleCop+ node in the tree.

Rule.Name: ConstructorSummaryDocumentationMustBeginWithStandardText
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the constructor's summary tag should be "Initializes a new instance." or should begin with the text: "{0}".
Rule.Description: Extends original SA1642 rule (disable SA1642 when using this rule). Allows any constructor to have the following summary text: "Initializes a new instance.".

Rule.Name: DestructorSummaryDocumentationMustBeginWithStandardText
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the destructor's summary tag should be "Finalizes an instance." or should begin with the text: "{0}".
Rule.Description: Extends original SA1643 rule (disable SA1643 when using this rule). Allows any destructor to have the following summary text: "Finalizes an instance.".

Rule.Name: CodeLineMustNotEndWithWhitespace
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing at the end of the line.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing at the end of the each code line.

Rule.Name: CodeLineMustBeginWithIdenticalWhitespaces
Rule.Context: You should not use different characters for indention.
Rule.Description: Validates that spacing at the beginning of the each code line uses identical characters.
